pos_mean_info_list.mean: 关心（concern的过去时和过去分词）；与…有关
担心地；关心公众事务地

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指对预料中的不祥之事的焦虑。
作“关心”用时，是indifference(冷漠)的反义词，侧重对他人健康、安全等的关心，也可暗示对困难、危险或失败等的忧虑。
强调因出于责任感或顾虑等而产生的不安。
侧重对未知事态演变的忧虑。
含义较广，侧重指已发生或必须去做的任何事情或事务。复数形式多指重大或较复杂的事务。
普通用词，着重指一件考虑中的或需要处理的事。
往往强调与个人或团体利害有直接或重大关系的事。
通常指较重要或较难而又必须承担的事情，也可指商事。
用作“事情”解时，词义较笼统、含糊，多用于指不很具体的事。

bilingual.source: To what extent does concern for others influence the choices you make?
bilingual.target: 关心他人在多大程度上影响你的选择？
安全是我们最关心的问题。

bilingual.source: His concern for his friends is very sincere.
bilingual.target: 他对朋友的关心非常真挚。

bilingual.source: Food safety is a concern for everyone.
bilingual.target: 食品安全是每个人都关心的问题。

bilingual.source: His majoy concern is the safety of his family.
bilingual.target: 他主要关心的是家人的安全。

bilingual.source: His primo concern is the safety of his family.
bilingual.target: 他的首要关心是家人的安全。

bilingual.source: His prima concern is the safety of his family.
bilingual.target: 他的主要的关心是家人的安全。

bilingual.source: Education is a primary concern for many parents.
bilingual.target: 教育是许多家长的主要关心点。

bilingual.source: She showed undue concern for a minor issue.
bilingual.target: 她对一个小问题表现出了过度的关心。

bilingual.source: She always shows sisterly concern for her friends.
bilingual.target: 她总是对朋友表现出姐妹般的关心。

list.abstract: 《Concern》是Solitude Aeturnus于1996年发行的一首歌曲。

yingyinNormal.en: Your health is my only concern.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的健康是我唯一关心的。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you planning on kidnapping a woman? Sarcasm? Yes, but mixed with genuine concern.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你打算绑架一个女人吗？讽刺吗？对，但也包含真诚的关心。

yingyinNormal.en: I appreciated your concern and all. It's just a suggestion. I told you not to worry about any of that. OK. Oh, Jesus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很感谢你的关心什么的。这只是一个建议。我告诉过你不用去担心这些。好吧。天啊。

yingyinNormal.en: I saved you a dumpling. Oh, your concern for me is touching. It will serve you well when you take me to the dentist tomorrow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我给你留了个饺子。你对我的关心真叫人感动，等你明天载我去看牙医我再好好报答你。

yingyinNormal.en: Actually, we're not. And perhaps you could express a little more concern over the fact that you stole and destroyed a $19 million vehicle. Bill me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实，我们不是。而且，你应该稍微关心一下你们偷窃并且毁掉一架价值一千九百万飞机的事实！账单寄给我！

yingyinNormal.en: It's a concern for you, too?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也担心这个吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Other lands are not my concern.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其他地方不关我的事。

yingyinNormal.en: What symptoms? Symptoms that are not your concern.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么症状？这你就不用管了。

yingyinNormal.en: Any issues or special concern with our current assessment?
yingyinNormal.zh: 针对我们目前评估结果还有什么要注意的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: My larger concern is your experience. You have very little.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我更担心的是你缺乏经验。

yingyinNormal.en: My biggest concern is funding. I couldn't fly coach to Iowa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我最大的担心是资金，我总不能坐普通舱去爱荷华。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, my only concern are the rumors. They could damage my chances.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是担心那些传言，的确会威胁我的胜算。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, Chandler why don't you take a walk? This doesn't concern you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 钱德，你出去一下，这件事与你无关。

yingyinNormal.en: Your concern is noted, Bruce. So how we doing? How are the accounts?
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道你担心了，布鲁斯。情况如何？账户如何？

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe he's just happy. Happiness isn't my concern. Not now, not ever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许他只是开心罢了。我不担心开心。现在不，从来都不。

yingyinNormal.en: Why should it concern you, Mr. President? You've announced that you're not running.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在乎什么呢，总统先生？你已经宣布不参加竞选了。

yingyinNormal.en: That's my concern. On the contrary. According to you, this concerns the whole world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我的问题。正好相反，按你说的，这是关系到全世界。

yingyinNormal.en: What is that? Doesn't concern you. You'll be going to the university every day? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是什么？跟你无关。你每天都会去大学吗？对。

yingyinNormal.en: Camouflaging bald spots. That's primarily a male concern. Perhaps could expand our market.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当作遮羞的用途，这能够吸引男士目光，也许我们可以扩大市场。

yingyinNormal.en: So, as far as the Americans are concern, you're a rogue assassin, a target of opportunity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以至少在美国方面，你是个凶残的杀手，通缉的目标。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (be concerned to do)认为(做某事)重要

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 涉及；关于；使担忧；使烦恼；使不安；关心；影响；关系到；从事；喜爱

sense_info_list.en: a matter of interest or importance to someone

examination_example.sentence: Feasibility should be a prime <highlight>concern</highlight> in policymaking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可行性应该是决策的首要考虑。

examination_example.sentence: Another nationwide <highlight>concern</highlight> is whether public funds from other agencies are going into construction in fire-prone districts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一件举国关切之事在于其他机构的公共资金是否将用于火灾易发区的建设。

examination_example.sentence: More frequent wildfires have become a national <highlight>concern</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 日益频发的野火已经成为全国关注的问题。

examination_example.sentence: These <highlight>concerns</highlight> aren't misplaced: Employment in manufacturing has fallen from 17 million in 1970 to 12 million in 2015.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些担忧并非无稽之谈：制造业的就业人数已经从1970年的1700万下降到2015年的1200万。

examination_example.sentence: Negative attitudes toward obesity, grounded in health <highlight>concerns</highlight>, have stimulated a number of anti-obesity polices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基于健康考虑而对肥胖产生的消极态度，已经引发不少对抗肥胖的政策。

examination_example.sentence: There are <highlight>concerns</highlight> that government, employers, and marketers might be able to access these data, thereby violating our privacy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们担心政府、雇主和营销人员可能会访问这些数据，从而侵犯我们的隐私。

examination_example.sentence: Readers produce different but overlapping readings of the same words on the page—including for texts that engage with fundamental human <highlight>concerns</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 读者对书页上相同的文字产生不同但有所重叠的解读——包括那些涉及人类所关切的根本性问题的文本。

examination_example.sentence: Fourth, electronic means of payment may raise security and privacy <highlight>concerns</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第四，电子支付方式可能会引起安全和隐私问题。

examination_example.sentence: Even if you cannot close that gap, maybe you can close others, and doing so would be to the benefit of all <highlight>concerned</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使，你无法弥合这一差距，也许你可以弥合其他差距，这样做将对所有相关方都有利。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 涉及；关于；使担忧；使烦恼；使不安；关心；影响；关系到；从事；喜爱

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: as far as I am concerned

examination_example.sentence: This causes <highlight>concern</highlight> as it can lead to an impression that whiteness is of greater value.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这引起了人们担心，因为它会给人留下白色更有价值的印象。

examination_example.sentence: A number of pioneers from the technology industry have expressed their <highlight>concerns</highlight> about the damage that a super-intelligent AI could do to humanity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 来自科技行业的许多先驱表达了他们对超级智能 AI 可能对人类造成的破坏的担忧。

examination_example.sentence: The world-renowned raised <highlight>concerns</highlight> that humanity could be the architect of its own destruction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位世界著名的物理学家担心人类可能会成为自我毁灭的缔造者。

sense_info_list.en: a matter of interest or importance to someone

examination_example.sentence: Such a situation is of great <highlight>concern</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种情况非常令人担忧。

examination_example.sentence: Their main <highlight>concern</highlight> is the potential impact on remote communities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们主要担心的是对偏远社区的潜在影响。

examination_example.sentence: The fourth cause <highlight>concerned</highlight> managers who've been promoted for reasons other than potential.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第四个原因是关于那些不是因为潜力而被提升的管理者。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指对预料中的不祥之事的焦虑。
强调因出于责任感或顾虑等而产生的不安。
作"关心"用时, 是 indifference(冷漠)的反义词, 侧重对他人健康、安全等的关心, 也可暗示对困难、危险或失败等的忧虑。
含义较广, 侧重指已发生或必须去做的任何事情或事务。复数形式多指重大或较复杂的事务。
通常指较重要或较难而又必须承担的事情, 也可指商事。
往往强调与个人或团体利害有直接或重大关系的事。
普通用词, 着重指一件考虑中的或需要处理的事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 涉及；关于；使担忧；使烦恼；使不安；关心；影响；关系到；从事；喜爱

examination_example.sentence: Given the increasing <highlight>concern</highlight> about health care costs for the aging population, Karraker believes policymakers should be aware of the relationship between disease and risk of divorce.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鉴于老龄化人口的医疗保健费用日益令人忧虑，Karraker 认为政策制定者应当重视疾病与离婚风险之间的关联。

examination_example.sentence: Understandably, there are <highlight>concerns</highlight> about what this means for public finances given the associated health and pension challenges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鉴于相关的医疗和养老金方面的挑战，人们担心这种趋势会对公共财政造成影响，这是可以理解的。

examination_example.sentence: "My primary <highlight>concern</highlight> is: How can I soften or civilize this message?" Says etiquette expert Dana Casperson.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 礼仪专家Dana Casperson说：“我主要关心的是：我如何软化或教化这条信息?”

sense_info_list.en: a matter of interest or importance to someone

examination_example.sentence: What is one of the man's chief <highlight>concerns</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个人最关心的问题是什么？

examination_example.sentence: "But our primary <highlight>concern</highlight> is to deliver an interior that maximizes comfort to create a pleasant environment."
examination_example.sentence_trans: “但我们最关心的是提供一个最大化舒适度的内饰，以创造一个舒适的环境。”

examination_example.sentence: To those Americans for whom money is a <highlight>concern</highlight>, my advice is simple: Buy what you can afford, and cook it yourself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于那些担心钱的美国人来说，我的建议很简单：买你能买得起的东西，然后自己做饭。

sense_info_list.en: to effect sb/sth; to involve sb/sth

examination_example.sentence: To whom it may <highlight>concern</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 致相关人员。

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 涉及；关于；使担忧；使烦恼；使不安；关心；影响；关系到；从事；喜爱

examination_example.sentence: What will Prof. Stone talk about next <highlight>concerning</highlight> elderly people?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于老年人，斯通教授接下来将讲些什么？

examination_example.sentence: What does the last paragraph mainly talk about <highlight>concerning</highlight> emotional intelligence?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于情商，最后一段主要讲了什么？

examination_example.sentence: An increasingly <highlight>concerned</highlight> nation took firm action to stop the destruction of migratory (迁徙的) waterfowl.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为阻止对迁徙的水禽的杀伤，一个日益感到担忧的国家（指美国）采取了坚决的行动。

examination_example.sentence: The large color decisions in your rooms <highlight>concern</highlight> the walls, ceilings, and floors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 房间主色调的选择与墙壁、天花板和地板有关。

sense_info_list.en: a matter of interest or importance to someone

examination_example.sentence: Time is a major <highlight>concern</highlight> of philosophers and scientists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 时间是哲学家和科学家最关心的问题。

examination_example.sentence: What is probably the major <highlight>concern</highlight> of travelers who choose to stay in a hostel?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 选择住在青年旅社的旅客最关心的是什么？

examination_example.sentence: Arguing is that you and your opponent present your <highlight>concerns</highlight> and discuss the feelings and issues related to those <highlight>concerns</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 争论是你和你的对手提出你的担忧，并讨论与这些担忧相关的感受和问题。

examination_example.sentence: It does point out that many parents still limit electronic reading, mainly due to <highlight>concerns</highlight> about increased screen time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它明确指出，许多家长仍然限制电子阅读，主要是因为担心孩子盯着屏幕看的时间增加。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指对预料中的不祥之事的焦虑。
强调因出于责任感或顾虑等而产生的不安。
作"关心"用时，是 indifference（冷漠）的反义词，侧重对他人健康、安全等的关心，也可暗示对困难、危险或失败等的忧虑。
含义较广，侧重指已发生或必须去做的任何事情或事务。复数形式多指重大或较复杂的事务。
通常指较重要或较难而又必须承担的事情，也可指商事。
往往强调与个人或团体利害有直接或重大关系的事。
普通用词，着重指一件考虑中的或需要处理的事。
